name: Ribbit
summary: A modern social networking platform built with Jetpack Compose
description: Ribbit is a modern social networking platform where users can share thoughts, ideas, and connect with others in meaningful ways. Built with the latest Android technologies including Jetpack Compose and Material Design 3.
author: Tekkadan

State preservation across navigation with history tracking
Thread view with comment hierarchy and smooth transitions
Profile management with drill-down animations
Search functionality with fade-through transitions
Responsive design with consistent motion patterns
Updated frog-themed app icons
Proper forward/backward navigation direction detection
